name: Bread of the Wild
description:
Control Bro in this 2D adventure. Find all the legendaries Breads of the Wild.

Controls:

A: move left.

D: move right.

Space: jump

You can also use a gamepad. I have only tested with xBox ones so if you use another one and doesn't work let me know!

This game uses this assets obtained from itch.io:

Pixel Adventure by Pixel Frog (itch.io)

Pixel Adventure 2 by Pixel Frog (itch.io)
